means.word_mean: 1. carnivorous dinosaur of the Permian in North America having a crest or dorsal sail

auth_sentence.content: His next stop was the dimetrodon, the progenitor of Mammalia.
auth_sentence.res_content: His next stop was the dimetrodon, the progenitor of Mammalia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His next stop was the dimetrodon, the progenitor of Mammalia.

auth_sentence.content: The early synapsid mammalian ancestors were sphenacodont pelycosaurs, a group that also included Dimetrodon.
auth_sentence.res_content: The early synapsid mammalian ancestors were sphenacodont pelycosaurs, a group that also included Dimetrodon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The early synapsid mammalian ancestors were sphenacodont pelycosaurs, a group that also included Dimetrodon.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, the sail of Dimetrodon is one of the largest secondary sexual traits of any animal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, the sail of Dimetrodon is one of the largest secondary sexual traits of any animal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, the sail of Dimetrodon is one of the largest secondary sexual traits of any animal.
